title: U.S. passenger-miles : Intercity/Amtrak 2007 to 2018
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes U.S. passenger-miles in millions. In total the number of data points it has is 12.
Overall U.S. passenger-miles in millions has increased over the Year.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2013 and 2014.
Maximum U.S. passenger-miles in millions, about 7283.0 was reported at Year 2013
The lowest U.S. passenger-miles in millions, of value 5784.0 was reported at Year 2007
min_summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes U.S. passenger-miles in millions. In total the number of data points it has is 12.
In general U.S. passenger-miles in millions has rose over the Year.

U.S. passenger-miles in millions is slightly increasing from 2007 to 2010, roughly constant from 2010 to 2011, slightly increasing from 2011 to 2013, slightly decreasing from 2013 to 2014, roughly constant from 2014 to 2017, and lastly roughly decreasing from 2017 to 2018.
